insert into fac_sys_user_approval
apply_id, approval_state, approver_id, approval_time, approval_sight, approval_level, opi, create_time, applicant_id, amount, projectName,
#{applyId}, #{approvalState}, #{approverId}, #{approvalTime}, #{approvalSight}, #{approvalLevel}, #{opi}, #{createTime}, #{applicantId}, #{amount}, #{projectName},
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_name as userName,c.user_id as userId,b.`dept_id` as deptId, b.parent_id as parentId,b.dept_name as deptName FROM sys_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS b ON a.`dept_id` = b.`dept_id` LEFT JOIN sys_user AS c ON b.`leader` = c.`user_name` AND b.`dept_id` = a.`dept_id` WHERE 1=1 and a.`user_id`= #{userId} ;
SELECT b.`user_id`as userId, a.`leader` as userName, a.`dept_name` as deptName FROM sys_dept AS a LEFT JOIN sys_user AS b ON a.`dept_id` = b.`dept_id` WHERE a.`dept_id` = #{deptId}
SELECT c.`role_name` FROM sys_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS b ON a.`user_id` = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS c ON b.`role_id` = c.`role_id` WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT d.`user_id` FROM sys_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS b ON a.`dept_id` = b.`dept_id` LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS c ON c.`dept_id` = b.`parent_id` LEFT JOIN sys_user AS d ON c.`leader` = d.user_name WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
